11.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS lobby_members (gym_id varchar(35) NOT NULL, user_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, count int(11) DEFAULT '1', time varchar(5) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`gym_id`,`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_lobby_members` FOREIGN KEY (`gym_id`) REFERENCES `active_raids` (`gym_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE);
